name: Description
info:
1. ### Receive websocket msg from ESP.
 2. ### Filter the data:
    - BME Readings
    - GPIO status feedback
 3. ### Process and distribute message
    - assign topic and scale BME readings
    - identify GPIO feedback
 4. ### Display received message
    - BME current - gauge
    - BME historic - chart
    - GPIO Feedback - LED / Template
 5. ### Control BME interval and
 6. ### Trigger BME reading

name: Description
info:
1. ### Process user inputs
    -  Thermostat deadband --> create flow variable
    -  Thermostat control --> evaluate heater required
    -  GPIO controls --> 0 / 1
2. ### Clean message (topic & msg only)
3. ### Send message to ESP via websocket
4. ### Show IP addresses
    - Get IP address from ESP (ws client)
    - Node-red IP address (ws server)

name: Clean object
